name: places/ChIJmyT_lTNawokRKrVkbPrZ8ng
formattedAddress: 62 Grand St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 62 Grand St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Full-service salon for wedding gowns & accessories, plus alterations & cleaning (appointment only).

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience with the White Gown team! Nela made my shopping experience relaxed and fun—she quickly understood my style and brought out lots of fun options. She was super respectful of my smaller budget. I was on a tight timeline (visited the shop in June and was getting married early Dec), but they listened to my worries and reassured me they could and would make that work. They did! They even moved my final fitting with their in-house tailor up a week when I needed it. They gave me great advice on transporting the dress as well.  Loved that it was a more boutique, smaller feel and that they had such a fun variety of dresses. Booking appts was easy unlike many other stores!

originalText.text: I was at a really tough spot in my search for a gown as i’m sure many also experience. I couldn’t seem to find a place that carried what I was looking for in my price range. On the fly I booked an appointment here and worked with Harlow. They were amazing! The patience, honesty and support was great. There’s amazing selection of dresses and the price ranges were great. I didn’t choose a gown here at my first visit but came back a few days later and said yes a dress!

originalText.text: Huge thank you to the white gown for helping me find my dress!! My mom traveled from out of town (and of course stuck in traffic) they were so accommodating, welcoming and friendly. They have a huge selection of gowns and really take the time to find you the right one. I can’t wait for my dress to come in! Thank you for making this such a memorable experience.

text.text: Huge thank you to the white gown for helping me find my dress!! My mom traveled from out of town (and of course stuck in traffic) they were so accommodating, welcoming and friendly. They have a huge selection of gowns and really take the time to find you the right one. I can’t wait for my dress to come in! Thank you for making this such a memorable experience.

originalText.text: They offer unparalleled service and an exquisite selection of dresses. With just two weeks left before my ceremony, the staff at the store has been incredibly patient and reassuring, ensuring that I have no worries. Despite facing size issues, they assisted me right up to the day before the wedding. I can confidently guarantee that you'll find your perfect dress in this store. Just take a look at the pictures I've captured!

originalText.text: I could not have asked for a better experience at The White Gown. While I ultimately did not walk away with my dress (yet!), working with Laura was a dream. After chatting through the initial details and showing her some dresses I had been interested in from other salons, she hit the racks and brought me a variety of dresses to try on; each with a different element of what I was looking for. She was extremely knowledgeable - about the dresses, the designers, as well as modification and alteration possibilities. She helped me articulate exactly what I was looking for and remained positive and focused throughout the appointment, continuing to suggest new dresses up until the very end of my time slot. Highly recommend!
